[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Nat ENNReal

abbrev P2009AIMEII_8_answer : ℕ × ℕ := sorry
theorem P2009AIMEII_8 :
  let p (k : ℕ) := (5/6)^(k-1) * (1/6)
  let S := { (d, l) : ℕ × ℕ | d = l ∨ d = l + 1 ∨ l = d + 1 }
  let prob := ∑' (x : ℕ × ℕ), if x ∈ S then p x.1 * p x.2 else 0
  prob = P2009AIMEII_8_answer.1 / P2009AIMEII_8_answer.2 ∧
  Coprime P2009AIMEII_8_answer.1 P2009AIMEII_8_answer.2 := by sorry. Enumerated answers: Enumerating probabilities P(X=d)*P(Y=l) for |d-l| ≤ 1, d,l=1..15
P(d=1, l=1) = 1/36
P(d=1, l=2) = 5/216
P(d=2, l=1) = 5/216
P(d=2, l=2) = 25/1296
P(d=2, l=3) = 125/7776
P(d=3, l=2) = 125/7776
